roleset.name: to accelerate

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yesterday 's vote on Japanese-American reparations ensures final enactment of the entitlement provision , which []-2 abandons earlier efforts [*]to find offsetting cuts but is seen [*-2]-1 as a more realistic path to [*] -1 expediting compensation first authorized [*] in 1988 .
